name: HeyOpal
description: We connect the dots in mental healthcare by unifying its landscape around the client. We give clients agency to inform their treatment, and support clinicians to deliver high-quality, scalable care by making communication more effective. We help progress continue between sessions using clinician-driven conversational AI interventions to promote higher engagement, retention, and ultimately better, faster treatment outcomes.
